commitResults.messageBody: Implemented an initial skeletal version of the Duke that simply greets the user and exits.

Added DukePrinter class to handle printing the output with the correct horizontal line separators and indents.
Added ability to echo all user input, except bye, which would cause the program to terminate.
Moved relevant printing code to DukePrinter.

Added userMessages array to store user messages and echo each element when "list" is entered by the user.
Added printMessages which echoes each element in a given array with the 1-based index of the element.

Added Task class to store the description of added messages and its marked status.
Added ability to return the string of the task represented with its marked status in brackets in front.
Added commands to mark and unmark with the 2nd argument in the input delimited by spaces to be the 1-based index of the task to be marked.
Replaced messages with tasks.

Added 3 new commands of todo(), deadline(by), and event(from, to) that the user can type into the console.
Added 3 subclasses of Task to allow for the 3 new commands.
Added prefixes 'T', 'D' and 'E' in the returned display of the task to correspond to the type of task being referred to.
Added printAddedTask function to allow easier display of tasks in list
Changed name of project to DukeNUS.
Changed the welcome message logo
Removed the default command to add task when no command is specified.

Added Javadoc comments on almost all functions.
Added Javadoc comments on classes.
Added comments on some variables.
Added error throwing for marking and unmarking tasks that are out of bounds.
Moved printing messages for marking and unmarking to DukeNUSPrinter.java.
Fixed some variable names using snake_case instead of camelCase.

Added packages "io" and "tasks" and moved corresponding classes into them.
Added error handling try-catch statements in switch statement for interpreting commands in user input.
Changed all error messages to be more consistent.
Moved main switch statement to `interpret_command()` function.
Fixed javadoc comments in DukeNUSPrinter.java to be neater.
Removed `isTaskIndexValid()` function.

Added new command "delete" that accepts 1 argument for the 1-based index of the task to delete.
Added printer function for the new delete command.
Added comments for the new functions.
Changed tasks array to be a dynamically sized array - ArrayList.
Changed caught exception from ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException to IndexOutOfBoundsException.

Added TasksDataRead to read data stored on a text file and insert it into the tasks ArrayList.
Added TasksDataWrite to write all tasks in tasks ArrayList to a text file that persists between instances.

Added functionality to run the program from a jar file.
Added function to store the tasks in tasks ArrayList in data/dukeNUS.txt, that will be retrieved by future instances of the program.
Added another parameter to all Task classes to allow functionality with the TasksDataWrite class and for the saved file to carry information on the done status of the task.
